defmodule Blockytalky.UserCode do
  use Blockytalky.DSL
start do
   set(:light , get_sensor_value(:A0)
  )
  set(:temp , gp_get_temp(:D2)
  )
  every_time(10) do
     serial_wrap("temp",get(:temp))
    say(get(:temp))
    for_time(3) do
       say("wait")

     end
    serial_wrap("light",get(:light))
    say(get(:light))

   end

end

end
